changeSet.author: Oleksiy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Favorite ( id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255), client_id bigint(20), parking_id bigint(20), CONSTRAINT Favorite_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), constraint fk_between_favorite_and_client foreign key (client_id) references client(id), constraint fk_between_favorite_and_parking foreign key (parking_id) references parking(id) );
